commit.message: Add jtreg test LongExceptionMessageTest, which is converted from the test case in https://bugs.openjdk.org/browse/JDK-8312401.

Change java_lang_String::as_symbol to return nullptr if the length of 'java_string' exceeds Symbol::max_length().
Revert java_lang_Throwable::create_initialization_error change that creates 'char *' message only.
Change java_lang_Throwable::create_initialization_error to create a 'char *' message without using a Symbol.
